reviewText: Incredible movie. It picks up where Jesus of Nazareth left off. If you don't have a good understanding a Biblical history it won't make sense. Thank you so much for having this available

ANNO DOMINI, based on Anthony Burgess' AD, which is a sequel to his JESUS OF NAZERETH ,tells the story of
THE ACTS OF THE APOSTLES but with invented subplots . This is a worthy addition to the classic biblical films.
(You need a DVD player capable of handling European format .)
